amendment.description: To express the sense of the Senate that certain Corps of Engineers projects should receive consideration for additional funding.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3068 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3068 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Kennedy to Amendment SA 2910. (consideration: CR S4333; text: CR S4334) To express the sense of the Senate that certain Corps of Engineers projects should receive consideration for additional funding.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3068 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3068 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Kennedy to Amendment SA 2910.
